moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. Bc4 Nf6 4. Nc3 Nc6: Sicilian and Ng5.......looks a little strange......
moves.5... e6 6. O-O d5 7. exd5 exd5 8. Qe2+ B: His developming is very very good!
moves.13. Nxf6+ Bxf6 14. Nf3 Re8 15. Qd1 Bxf3: I try to exchange pieces, but I'm starting understand it's gonna be a draw...
moves.18. Bxg5 Qxg5 19. Rae1: He tries exchange, but this time I can't accept cause White will #me in 3 moves, in that way.
moves.19... Rac8 20. Re4 a5 21. Rfe1 Kf8: Castled king who defends the R is good to see!
Understood it's gonna be a draw, so I.....
moves.26. Rxg4: And he refuses! I can understand him, but I think there aren't many solutions (without a bad mistake of course)!
moves.32... a4 33. bxa4 bxa4 34. f4: Now he offers draw and i accepted. I hate offering draws, but in this game I didn't see something bad we've done. I mean no one was winning and no one was losing. What are your opinions? Were there a solution I didn't see (in the middle game I mean). Thanks for reading, bye!!
